lead_paragraph: TULLY--William J.,90, of Pelham Manor, passed away peacefully at his home on Thursday, July 21. He was predeceased by his adoring wife of over 55 years, Kay. He was a loving father to nine, grandfather to 18 and great- grandfather to nine. He was a tennis legend both nationally and internationally, earning 22 national titles, the Canadian Tennis Championships and the World Singles Championships in the 75's Senior Division. For services, visit: www.pelhamfuneral.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TULLY, WILLIAM J.
